## Day 10 of \#30DayChartChallenge
Distributions: Experimental

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(tidyverse)
require(distributional)
require(ggdist)
```

```{r sim_data}
n1 <- 90
n2 <- 100
m1 <- .7
m2 <- .8
s1 <- 1.2
s2 <- 0.9

diff_m <- m2-m1
diff_s <- sqrt(((n1-1)*s1^2 + (n2-1)*s2^2)/(n1+n2-2))

t <- diff_m / (diff_s * sqrt( (1/n1) + (1/n2)))
df <- (n1+n2-2)

d <- tibble(
  group = c('Group 1', 'Group 2', 'Difference'),
  mean = c(m1, m2, diff_m),
  sd = c(s1, s2, diff_s)
)

d %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
    y=group, 
    xdist=dist_normal(mean, sd)
    )) + 
  stat_halfeye(aes(fill=group)) +
  theme_classic() +
  labs(y='Source')


```
